title: Game crashes entire pc
body: I have been playing on the legacy client, since the new client causes errors for me. the game runs without no lag, about 50+ fps all the time. then sometimes randomly, the whole game freezes, crashing my whole pc requiring a reset.(holding down the power button).

replies.body: The client is independent of the game itself (when you're in the match).  Are you on Windows 10?  An update auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has caused some freezes like this.  Try disabling that for the fix!
